root.title: mead mea file 150 mln dlr shelf registr
root.body: mead corp sai file shelf registr secur exchang commiss cover potenti debt secur offer 150 mln dlr sai underwrit offer mai includ smith barnei harri upham co inc goldman sach co salomon brother inc mead sai proce will us retir short term debt portion incur financ part recent acquisit ampad corp zellerbach distribut group
